statements: SELECT * FROM vulnerability_assessments;
SELECT assessment_date, assessment_type, security_weakness FROM vulnerability_assessments;
SELECT id, remediation_action FROM vulnerability_assessments WHERE assessment_type = 'Network';
SELECT * FROM vulnerability_assessments WHERE assessment_type = 'Web Application' ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT security_weakness, remediation_action FROM vulnerability_assessments WHERE id = 5;
SELECT * FROM vulnerability_assessments WHERE assessment_type = 'Penetration Test' ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT assessment_date, assessment_type, security_weakness FROM vulnerability_assessments WHERE security_weakness LIKE '%SQL Injection%' ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT id, assessment_type, remediation_action FROM vulnerability_assessments WHERE assessment_type IN ('Code Review', 'Penetration Test') ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM vulnerability_assessments WHERE assessment_date >= '2021-01-01' AND assessment_date <= '2021-12-31' ORDER BY assessment_date;
SELECT assessment_type, COUNT(*) AS total_assessments FROM vulnerability_assessments GROUP BY assessment_type ORDER BY total_assessments DESC;
SELECT * FROM vulnerability_assessments ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT assessment_name, severity_level FROM vulnerability_assessments WHERE assessment_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM vulnerability_assessments WHERE severity_level = 'High';
SELECT assessment_name, assessment_date FROM vulnerability_assessments WHERE severity_level = 'Medium' ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT action_id, action_description, action_status FROM remediation_actions WHERE action_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM vulnerability_assessments WHERE severity_level = 'High';
SELECT assessment_name, assessment_date FROM vulnerability_assessments WHERE assessment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM vulnerability_assessments ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;

SELECT assessment_id, assessment_name, COUNT(*) AS total_actions FROM vulnerability_assessments LEFT JOIN remediation_actions ON vulnerability_assessments.assessment_id = remediation_actions.assessment_id GROUP BY assessment_id, assessment_name;

SELECT a.assessment_id, a.assessment_name, AVG(CASE WHEN r.action_status = 'Completed' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS completion_rate FROM vulnerability_assessments a LEFT JOIN remediation_actions r ON a.assessment_id = r.assessment_id GROUP BY a.assessment_id, a.assessment_name ORDER BY completion_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM vulnerability_assessment
SELECT id, date, severity, description FROM vulnerability_assessment ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT id, name, description FROM regulations WHERE id = 1
SELECT vulnerability_id, regulations_id, action_taken FROM remediation WHERE date_completed > '2021-01-01'
SELECT id, name FROM regulations ORDER BY name
SELECT * FROM vulnerability_assessment WHERE severity='High';
SELECT * FROM vulnerability_assessment WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT vulnerability_id, regulations.name, action_taken FROM remediation INNER JOIN regulations ON remediation.regulations_id = regulations.id;
SELECT id, description FROM vulnerability_assessment WHERE severity='Medium' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT va.id, va.date, r.name AS regulations_name FROM vulnerability_assessment AS va JOIN remediation AS r ON va.id = r.vulnerability_id;
SELECT * FROM vulnerability_assessments;
SELECT id, assessment_type, findings FROM vulnerability_assessments;
SELECT regulation_name, compliance_requirement, enforcement_date FROM regulations;
SELECT remediation_date, remediation_status, notes FROM remediation_history;
SELECT id, weakness_name, affected_system, severity_level FROM security_weaknesses;
SELECT * FROM vulnerability_assessments ORDER BY assessment_date DESC, id ASC;
SELECT id, assessment_type, remediation_plan FROM vulnerability_assessments WHERE assessment_type = 'Penetration Test' AND remediation_plan IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, regulation_name, enforcement_date FROM regulations WHERE enforcement_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY enforcement_date ASC;
SELECT id, weakness_name, severity_level FROM security_weaknesses WHERE severity_level IN ('High', 'Critical') AND affected_system = 'Database' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, remediation_status, remediation_approver FROM remediation_history WHERE remediation_status = 'Completed' OR remediation_approver = 'Admin';
SELECT vulnerability_name, vulnerability_description FROM vulnerabilities
SELECT vulnerability_name, severity_level FROM vulnerabilities WHERE severity_level > 2
SELECT assessment_id, assessment_date, assessment_type FROM assessments ORDER BY assessment_date DESC
SELECT * FROM assessment_results JOIN vulnerabilities ON assessment_results.vulnerability_id = vulnerabilities.vulnerability_id
SELECT * FROM vulnerabilities WHERE vulnerability_id = 1
SELECT * FROM vulnerabilities ORDER BY vulnerability_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT vulnerability_name, severity_level FROM vulnerabilities WHERE severity_level > 3
SELECT * FROM assessments WHERE assessment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'

SELECT v.vulnerability_name, r.remediation_description FROM vulnerabilities v JOIN assessment_results ar ON v.vulnerability_id = ar.vulnerability_id JOIN remediations r ON ar.remediation_id = r.remediation_id

SELECT a.assessment_type, COUNT(ar.result_id) AS total_results FROM assessments a LEFT JOIN assessment_results ar ON a.assessment_id = ar.assessment_id GROUP BY a.assessment_type ORDER BY total_results DESC
